alert.note: Alert for St. Clair; Vernon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 1:19PM CST until January 08 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory this afternoon, snow expected. For the second Winter Weather Advisory Tuesday, snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Kansas, Bourbon and Crawford Counties. In Missouri, St. Clair and Vernon Counties. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Kansas, call 5 1 1 for road conditions. In Missouri, call 1-888-275-6636 for road conditions.
